content: --लेख {%<ab>a.</ab>%} of beautiful outlines, highly arched; रुचिस्तव कलावती रुचिरचित्रलेखे भ्रुवौ <ls>Gīt. 10.</ls> (--खा {1} a portrait, picture. {2} <ab>N.</ab> of a friend and companion of Uṣā, daughter of Bāṇa. [When Uṣā related to her her dream, she suggested the idea of taking the portraits of all young princes in the neighbourhood; and on Uṣā's recognising Aniruddha, Chitralekhā, by means of her magical power, conveyed him to her palace].
